title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=79f0d698e4abf87f45628ddd3057be3fe4b83435
comments:
I am looking for writers for a brief paid gig. 

DM me with your details especially if you have Amazon, Goodread accounts and social media presence

Hi!  
I am a freelance writer, editor and translator. I am a liberal arts student with 3+ years of professional experience in editing and writing, including copywriting, copyediting and developmental editing. I also offer proofreading, translation (Malayalam/French to English). Additionally, I can review and provide feedback on SOPs, essays, or any non-technical writing in English.

I am a social media consultant as well, for businesses and individuals, for a small retainer fee. Additionally, I do Notion consulting, which helps small businesses streamline their processes through digital organization.   
I am based in Delhi and Trivandrum at the moment, but I offer most of my services remotely.   
Please PM to contact me. I can work via email, whatsapp or videocalls.  
Thanks!

Hi, I am a working professional looking for a freelancing/part-time job. I have almost two years of experience in the field of content writing and have a good grasp over SEO. Additionally, I am experienced in working with tools like WordPress and SurferSEO. I'm looking for WFH and if you are looking for someone who can write content that connects with audience and drives in revenue and traffic, you can contact me via PM. We can talk in details over there.
